Evidence of connections to internal serv.Data: Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625, Zeek conn.log
Evidence of connections to internal serv.Action: Analyze successful and failed login attempts (Windows Event ID 4624, 4625, Zeek conn.log). Correlate login attempts with known external information sources (e.g., publicly listed email addresses in WHOIS, hostnames from certs). Look for unusual patterns or login attempts to systems or services not typically accessed by external users.

Network connection attempts or probes ta.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for connection attempts (especially on unusual ports or to less-common services) from external IPs. Correlate destination hostnames/IPs from conn.log and dns.log with publicly available network scan data or passive DNS records. Identify connection attempts to internal systems using hostnames or IPs that appear listed in such external sources.
